sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { View,Text } from 'react-native'

export default function App() {
  return (
  <View style={{flex:1}}>
    <View style={{flex:.5,backgroundColor:'red',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'}}>
      <Text style={{color:'white'}}>This If Flex System</Text>
    </View>
    <View style={{flex:2,backgroundColor:'green',justifyContent:'flex-end',alignItems:'flex-end'}}>
      <View style={{flex:0.1,backgroundColor:'yellow'}}>
        <Text>This is second flex</Text>
      </View>
    </View>
    <View style={{flex:2,backgroundColor:'blue'}}>
      <View style={{flex:0.1,backgroundColor:'white'}}>
        <Text>this thired flex</Text>
      </View>
    </View>
  </View>
  )
}
